definitions.text: a narrow strait connecting two bodies of water
make or become more narrow or restricted

examples: I cannot narrow down the rules for this game

definitions.text: become more focus on an area of activity or field of study
examples: She specializes in Near Eastern history

definitions.text: become tight or as if tight

examples: a narrow line across the page
the narrow sense of a word

definitions.text: lacking tolerance or flexibility or breadth of view
characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination
examples: a minute inspection of the grounds
